entry.title: Volunteers are the lifeblood of rugby!

media:group.media:title: Volunteers are the lifeblood of rugby!
media:group.media:description:
Transformational stories introduces Rebecca Davies, who recalls her experience at the 2015 RWC and being a volunteer that meant she was amongst some of the greatest teams in the world. Here she talks about the importance of volunteers and how it helped her career in rugby.
#Rugby #Capgemini #TransformationalStories

entry.title: Leading the Double Olympic Champions to the Rugby World Cup!

media:group.media:title: Leading the Double Olympic Champions to the Rugby World Cup!
media:group.media:description:
Ben Gollings took up the role as Fiji 7s head coach, and was immediately tasked with the need for success as the double olympic champions sought their first Rugby World Cup 7s title in 17 years. In this weeks HSBC Connected he also talks about his long term plan for the island and what he hopes to achieve!
#Rugby #Sevens #Fiji
